blocks.headline: TinaCMS: Empowering Teams to Achieve More
blocks.text: TinaCMS seamlessly integrates with your team's workflow, whether you're a developer needing control and flexibility or an editor wanting an intuitive interface.

blocks.content:
## Supercharge Your Team’s Productivity with TinaCMS

TinaCMS offers the best of both worlds: the power of Git and the ease of a CMS, making it perfect for teams working on new or existing sites.

items.headline: Intuitive for Editors
items.text: TinaCMS abstracts away the complexities of Git, providing a user-friendly interface. Editors don't need to know anything about Git to use TinaCMS.

items.headline: Flexible for Developers
items.text: Developers retain control and flexibility with TinaCMS. It's built to work with existing sites (brownfield sites) and allows developers to create an optimal editor experience.

items.headline: Work how you want!
items.text: With TinaCMS, team members can choose to edit directly in Markdown files in the repository or through the TinaCMS interface. Choose the way that works best for your workflow.

items.headline: Editorial Workflow Capabilities
items.text: Leverage the power of Git-based workflows for editing and reviewing changes. TinaCMS's branching and merging features facilitate efficient collaboration.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's open-source frontend fosters an environment of community contribution and regular updates, ensuring your team stays ahead.

items.headline: Git-Backed Version Control
items.text: With TinaCMS, all your content is stored in Git, providing the best version control system. This makes tracking changes and managing different versions a breeze.

blocks.headline: Elevate Your Team’s Workflow Today
blocks.text: Start using TinaCMS to boost your team’s productivity and collaboration.

seo.title: TinaCMS for Teams: Boost Your Team’s Productivity
seo.description: Unleash your team’s potential with TinaCMS. Offering Git power with CMS simplicity, TinaCMS is an excellent choice for teams seeking a flexible, intuitive solution.
